about_the_game:
Introducing The Nude Mod and Media DLC for Inheritance: Ladeina's Path!



With The Nude Mod DLC, you can unlock tasteful nude models for your favorite characters. Spice up your gameplay experience with this exciting addition!

The Media DLC includes all rendered movies and the original soundtrack (OST), so you can relive your favorite moments from the game with stunning visuals and high-quality music.

By purchasing these DLCs, you'll not only enhance your gameplay experience but also support our team's ongoing efforts to improve the game.

With this package, you'll receive lifetime updates to all contents.


Thank you for being part of this!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB 700MHz
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
